评论详情: I was a little nervous after reading the reviews and I honestly didn’t think it would fit right, but I was wrong it fit perfectly!! I wear between a 38 and 42 DD bra. I am 5’7 and 160lbs, it is a good length as well, it comes down just to the top of my pants. Being a little thicker in the belly area. I was afraid it would show too much belly for me but it’s perfect and the lace is not too see through but just enough to be sexy! The material is soft and not scratchy like some lace. It is a little thin so I can see how it would be easy to tear. Over all it was a great buy and I can’t wait to wear it!!

评论概述: Fit is good... Material not so much
评论详情: The shirt arrived as a gift for my wife in a plain white bag. Inside the shirt was in a clear plastic bag. It arrived unscathed so that is always a plus.  The fit on my wife was actually quite nice but the material was super cheap and scratchy. It was only tolerable for her for about 2 minutes before she had to take it off as it was that uncomfortable. I guess you get what you pay for lol.  I give it two stars, one for fit and one for the quick shipping to get it to me in time for the event she wanted to wear it to. In the end it was returned due to the uncomfortable nature of the fabric. I cannot recommend this product.

I really like the brown shade! Comfortable, soft, and stretchy fabric that's fun to wear. The halter top tie has plenty of length to adjust to your needs, and the fit is slim and flattering. Nice stitching and good quality lace.  Despite being unlined, it's surprisingly supportive and not see through in the chest area, with some extra thickness in the fabric. Sizing is normal. My only comment is that the lower lace has a habit of creeping upward over time, so you may need to watch for that as you wear it. Lovely!

I was skeptical about this shirt because I'd tried another top from this brand and the sizing was way off, but this particular top fits perfectly (I'm 5'6", 128 lbs, athletic build, and I bought a small)!  It looks super cute in general, makes the ladies look nice, and is stretchy enough to be comfy while still flattering.  I'm going to be wearing it often this summer!

Super cute, true to size and color was spot on. This top is not made for anyone with a bigger chest. I'm sure it works great for those with a small chest, but there is absolutely no support to this top. This  is very cute and nice to wear. The quality is amazing and I've gotten complements on it. I can tell its long lasting, its well made.

评论概述: Another win for Reoria 😍 How did they get this lacey beaut to be so soft!!
评论详情: This is the second garment I have ordered from Reoria that looks like sheer and effortlessly sexy lace but feels so soft and nice on my skin. Whatever they have come up with is definitely working, as I wore this top for 10- plus hours and haven’t felt even the slightest discomfort or urge to take it off and toss on my Snuggie (which is gnarly because the Snuggie ALWAYS makes an appearance at some point in the night 😂  Anywho, I am between a size SM and a MED, and I am very happy to report the size MED was a winner. I do think this top is sheer and stretchy enough that someone in between sizes, like myself, can opt for the smaller of the sizes and have it look great, feel comfy and well-fitted, and be confident the correct size was chosen.  The black reminds me of some classic old school apparel with a mix of old school. I have size 36 full Ds, and it doesn’t look trashy. With that being said, I think this top accommodates women of all shapes & sizes especially when it comes to the size of the bust  Highly highly recommended

This half lace halter top is sexy, soft and looks great, great with jeans, shorts, skirts or even wear as a swimsuit top, halter ties are stretchy and comfortable, top part is lined with super soft material, great value
It’s very nice and comfy. The material is wonderful and elegant. The design with lace is very smooth and stretchy. Price is reasonable. Great product and highly recommend it!
